text: Old Joe may refer to: * Old Joe Clark, folk song * Joseph Chamberlain Memorial Clock Tower at the University of Birmingham, England * 10515 Old Joe, an asteroid * Joe Camel, a former advertising mascot for Camel cigarettes * Joseph Stalin, (1879–1953) Communist dictator of then-USSR between 1929 until his death in 1953. * Old Joe, a minor character in Charles Dickens classic A Christmas Carol's Ghost of Christmas Future sequence; a fence who buys the belongings of the deceased Ebenezer Scrooge from a trio of thieves who previously worked for Scrooge. * Old Joe (Breaking Bad), a character in the TV series Breaking Bad *Old Joe (Norfork, Arkansas), listed on the U.S. National Register of Historic Places in Arkansas *Joseph P. Kennedy, patriarch of the Kennedy political family
title: Old Joe
